functions.name: registerChromeUrl
functions.description: Register folders which should be available as chrome:// urls (as defined in the legacy chrome.manifest)

functions.name: doSomethingWithJSM
functions.description: Async function that loads a given JSM and does something with it. Upon Add-On shutdown, the JSM will be unloaded.

parameters.name: aPath
parameters.description: Either the chrome:// path to the JSM or its relative location from the root of the extension.
